description: Describes the underground feeder hardware for Phields project
title: FeederConfig

portName.description: The COM port for the underground feeder (output expander) board

id.description: The id of the feeder in the arena

pelletDeliveryRetryCount.description: The number of times that retries to deliver a pellet before reporting an error

pelletDeliveryTimeoutSeconds.description: The amount of time that waits for a pellet to be delivered before reporting as failed to deliver

wheelRadius.description: The radius of the wheel used for distance calculations, positive or negative related to the side where the encoder is placed in the wheel
